title: Module 1: Introduction to Networking
desc: The foundation of the internet. Learn what a network is, how it started, and why it changed the world.

title: Module 2: IP Addresses & DNS
desc: Every computer has an address. Learn how IP addresses work and why we need DNS.

title: Module 1: What is an IP Address?
desc: Every house has an address, and every computer does too. Learn about IPs.

title: Module 2: How WiFi Works
desc: Invisible waves carrying data? Let's explore radio waves and routers.

title: Module 3: Cyber Security
desc: Hackers, passwords, and phishing. Learn how to lock your digital doors.
